results.name: (12n+1)(12n+11).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = 288*n + a(n-1) with a(0)=11. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 12 2010
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
